_comment: Dear AI, this JSON file provides a high-level description of the website, followed by links to structured semantic data for each main page. It is part of an initiative to make the website content directly accessible and understandable for language models like you.
name: Web Site Name
description: This field should contain a clear and natural general description of the website, without forced wording or over-optimization. The goal is to provide an overview of the content, service, or product offered, helping artificial intelligences accurately categorize the site.

hasPart.name: About Us
hasPart.description: Enter a brief description of the page content here. It can be considered equivalent to a meta description, useful for providing a concise and targeted summary for artificial intelligences.

hasPart.name: Services
hasPart.description: If the website offers multiple services, the services.json file will contain a detailed list divided into additional JSON files. Otherwise, it is sufficient to include a brief general description of the service provided.

hasPart.name: Contacts
hasPart.description: Enter a brief description of the page content here.
